dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S203 IS: Defund Planned Parenthood Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul (for himself, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Budd, Mr. Schmitt, Mr. Tillis, Mr. Cruz, and Mr. Banks) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund Planned Parenthood Act.
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be made available to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, or to any of its affiliates.
